name: Ant Swarm (Gary N.)
description:
This is my official submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2, with the theme YOU ARE NOT ALOT. 

This is a short game I made by myself between August 21st and August 28th, in this you play as an ant queen trying to rebuild her colony by killing, and eating everything else around her.

Created By Gary N. 

Credits 

Sounds from https://freesound.org/ (vox_artist, monte32, crashoverride6, Caitlin_100, matthewHoldenSound)

Images from https://www.pexels.com/ (@kelly, @fotios-photos)

Background music from (Ultimate Game Music Collection)

Additional Textures from https://polyhaven.com/ (Rob Tuytel, Rico Cilliers) and https://kenney.nl/assets?q=ui

Shader from (Simple Toon) 

Everything else (Scripts, 3D models, Animations, additional textures were self made.)
